title: Family History
writeup: Or click here to view it on GitHub!

I love my family, and I owe a lot to them. This project was an opportunity to make something that would be valuable to them. It's a database of stories and facts about my ancestors. I built it in PHP and have it connected to a MySQL database, and am hosting it on my CloudClock server

title: Precipice Ponderings
writeup: Or click here to view it on GitHub!

This started as a project for an introductory web development class. The requirements were to build a multi page site related to something I was interested in. I took it further and turned it into a responsive site with dynamically generated pages.
